children.text:
Our Mission

We want to provide a friendly and warm place to let everyone can anonymously share true thoughts and emotions without pressure.

We need everyone’s cooperation to maintain the community’s atmosphere. Therefore, there are some rules we need you to follow:


Basic Rules

1. All illegal behavior are not allowed.

2. According to Google Play’s policy, the posts that contain or promote sexually explicit content, such as pornography are not allowed. For example, posts like 23 female who wants to come to my dorm tonight? are strictly forbidden.

3. Aggressive words and verbal abuse are not allowed. For example, posts like #3 you moron go find your retarded friends are strictly forbidden.

4. Plagiarize others’ posts or articles are not allowed. Please indicate the source in the post if you credit online.

5. Please don’t publish post with only one sentence or advertisements. Otherwise, the post might be deleted. For example, posts like Affordable luxuries. My ebay********.

6. All kinds of malicious behavior are strictly forbidden.


Privacy Policy

1. Please do not exchange personal and contact information or post any link that may reveal information of any private figure. For example, posts like My number 347-XXX-XXXX and Olivia Williams who works at *** give my money back!

2. Please do not post any picture that will make others identify anyone such as selfie with whole face.

3. Do not pretend others with their pictures or personal information.


All posts against rules above will be deleted. If you break the rules too many times, you will be prevented from posting and commenting temporary or permanently.
